title: Anti-Trans Evil, Fast 9 AKA Wild Speed Jet Break 4.15.21
itunes:title: Anti-Trans Evil, Fast 9 AKA Wild Speed Jet Break 4.15.21
description:
In episode 858, Jack and Miles are joined by Sparkleside Chats with Magical Girl Ayu's Ayumi Shinozaki to discuss forging vaccine passports, anti-trans bills in Texas and more, Colton Underwood, the new Fast 9 trailer, the scam that is White Claw, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Ayumi's Print Shop
  2. I Forged New York’s Digital Vaccine Passport in 11 Minutes Flat
  3. Introducing bills like this serves a purpose even when they’re expected not to go anywhere. That purpose is to make other legislative initiatives targeting human rights seem reasonable, and to pave the way for ever more radical authoritarianism. Someday, this law could pass
  4. Texas bill would designate gender-affirming care for transgender minors as child abuse
  5. Former 'Bachelor' star Colton Underwood comes out as gay
  6. It’s good to be back. Watch the new #F9 trailer now.
  7. White Claw Launches New 'Surge' Flavors That Come in Bigger Cans and Have a Higher Alcohol Content
  8. White Claw will make its biggest ad push ever as seltzer space heats up
  9. How Tax Policy Gave Us White Claw
  10. The White Claw Tax Law Flaw
  11. What White Claw Obsession Says About Our Changing Relationship to Alcohol
  12. How Healthy (or Not Healthy) Is White Claw?
  13. How White Claw and the hard seltzer craze are taking on beer—and taking over America
  14. LISTEN: Encerrada - Reyna Tropical 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
